name: Super Bowling
overview: WELCOME TO THE FAST LANE... The thrill of a three strike turkey. The heartbreak of a 7-10 split. It's all here in Super Bowling - the only 16-bit game that lets you pulverize pins in your very own bowling center. FOUR COOL CHARACTERS TO CHOOSE FROM: "Pins" Peterson - A perfect blend of style and strength. "Spinner" Spencer - Great curves... on and off the lanes. "Red" Randall - She's got the precision game down pat. "Muscles" Maxwell - Unleash his pure pin-bustin' power.
